name: SHCatalog
desc: An abstract base class for storing reference signatures and their associated metadata.

items.name: var maximumQuerySignatureDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The maximum duration of a query signature that you use to match reference signatures in the catalog.

items.name: var minimumQuerySignatureDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The minimum duration of a query signature that you use to match reference signatures in the catalog.
